page.title: 03Recreation
page.content: {GAMES WE PLAY.} In the playground we play lots of games,we play{Charlie}Chase.How we play it is,we get ten or twenty children and we dip who is on and the person who is on has to shut their eyes and turn around andpoint to some one and the person who has been pointed to has to run and the person who is on has to run after them and then they run back to the others ,how we dip is:_We make a circle and I dip and I say "dippy doppy dippy doo it shall not be you because I say so,so out you must go" and when Isay go that person is on and I choose them in turns..... {These are some games {played by infant school children. { }
